name: Solitaire Win!!!
description:
Now, you can bring the classic game Solitaire that you’ve been playing on your computer for years wherever you go!

Play games to win real money prizes!

How to play:
Tap and drag cards to arrange them in descending order with alternating colors.
Empty spots may be filled with a King.
To score high, tap to move cards up to the foundation stacks from Ace to King.

Features:
Simple to use and easy to navigate with world-class UI design
Play games to win real money prizes
Cash tournaments coming soon

If you have any questions, please reach out to support@celer.network
